# WordPress REST API endpoints for the Customizer

Endpoints for managing changesets, settings, controls, sections, panels, partials, and anything specific to WordPress's live preview interface.

**Contributors:** [wordpressdotorg](https://profiles.wordpress.org/wordpressdotorg)  
**Tags:** [rest](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/rest), [customizer](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/customizer)  
**Requires at least:** 4.7.0  
**Tested up to:** 4.8.0-alpha  
**Stable tag:** master  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/WP-API/wp-api-customize-endpoints.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/WP-API/wp-api-customize-endpoints) 

## Description ##

See Trac tickets:

* [#38900](https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/38900): Customize: Add REST API endpoints for changesets
* [#39634](https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/39634): Customize: Add REST API endpoints for panels, sections, controls, settings, and partials

For contributing patches to this plugin and for following developments, please see its [GitHub project](https://github.com/WP-API/wp-api-customize-endpoints).
